Dear Muhammad Tayyab,

We are pleased to offer you the position of AI Engineer at DESCON, located in Lahore. We were impressed with your skills and experience, and we believe you will be a valuable addition to our team.

**Position Details:**

- **Job Title:** AI Engineer

- **Working Hours:** 8 AM to 5 PM

**Employment Terms:**

We look forward to welcoming you to our team.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]

DESCON

**DESCON**

**Offer Letter**

**Email:** imranshakeel_khan@gmail.com  

**Position Details**  
**Job Title:** Backend Developer (Node.js & Nest.js Expert)  
**Start Date:** 14 February 2025  
**Working Hours:** 8 hours per day  
**Salary:** 20,000 per month  
**Location:** Lahore  

As a Backend Developer, you will be responsible for designing and implementing server-side logic, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements using Node.js and Nest.js frameworks.

**Benefits**  
- Health insurance  
- Paid vacations per year  
- Professional development and training opportunities  

**Employment Terms**  
This is a full-time role.  

**Acceptance**  
To accept this offer, please sign and return a copy of this letter by replying to this email. If you have any questions or need further clarification, feel free to contact me.  

**Offer Expiry Date:** 10 July 2025

**DESCON**

**Offer Letter**

**Date:** February 10, 2025

**Candidate Name:** Imran Khan  
**Email:** imranshakeel_khan@yahoo.com  

Dear Imran Khan,

We are pleased to offer you the position of **Senior Business Developer - Software Development** at DESCON. In this role, you will be responsible for driving business growth through strategic development initiatives, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and leveraging your expertise to enhance our software solutions.

**Position Details:**

- **Job Title:** Senior Business Developer - Software Development
- **Start Date:** 3 weeks from the date of this letter
- **Working Hours:** 8-9 hours per day
- **Salary:** 85,000 per month
- **Location:** Lahore

**Benefits:**

- Health insurance coverage
- Paid vacations per year
- Professional development and training opportunities

**Employment Terms:**

This is a full-time role, and you will be expected to adhere to the company's policies and procedures.

**Acceptance:**

To accept this offer, please sign and return a copy of this letter by replying to this email. If you have any questions or need further clarification, feel free to contact me.

**Offer Expiry Date:** 3 weeks from the date of this letter

We look forward to welcoming you to our team and are confident that you will make a significant contribution to DESCON.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
DESCON

Dear Imran Khan,

**Position Details:**

- **Job Title:** Senior Business Developer - Software Development
- **Start Date:** February 24, 2025
- **Working Hours:** 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
- **Salary:** 100,000 PKR per month

**DESCON**

**[Date: February 10, 2025]**

**[Candidate Name: Imran Khan]**

**[Candidate Email: imran.khan@example.com]**

Dear Imran Khan,

We are pleased to extend an offer of employment for the position of Project Manager at DESCON. We are confident that your skills and experience will be a valuable asset to our team.

**Position Details:**

- **Job Title:** Project Manager
- **Start Date:** February 24, 2025
- **Working Hours:** 8 AM to 5 PM
- **Salary:** PKR 100,000 per month
- **Location:** Lahore

In this role, you will be responsible for overseeing project planning, execution, and completion, ensuring that all projects are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget. Your leadership will be crucial in coordinating with various teams to achieve project goals.

**Benefits:**

- Health insurance coverage
- Paid vacation days per year
- Professional development and training opportunities

**Employment Terms:**

This is a full-time role with an initial probation period of 3 months to assess performance and fit within the team.

**Acceptance:**

To accept this offer, please sign and return a copy of this letter by replying to this email by February 17, 2025. If you have any questions or need further clarification, feel free to contact me.

We look forward to welcoming you to our team.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
DESCON

---

Please review the offer letter and let me know if you would like to add or change anything?'}]

**DESCON**

**Offer Letter**

**Date:** 12 February 2025

**Candidate Name:** Imran Khan  
**Email:** imranshakeel_khan@yahoo.com  

Dear Imran Khan,

We are pleased to offer you the position of **Senior Business Developer - Software Development** at DESCON. We were impressed with your skills and experience, and we believe you will be a valuable addition to our team.

**Position Details:**

- **Job Title:** Senior Business Developer - Software Development
- **Start Date:** 26 February 2025
- **Working Hours:** 8 AM to 9 PM
- **Salary:** PKR 85,000 per month
- **Location:** Lahore

In this role, you will be responsible for driving business growth through strategic development and execution of software solutions. Your expertise in identifying market opportunities and building client relationships will be crucial to our success.

**Benefits:**

- Health insurance coverage
- Paid vacations: 20 days per year
- Professional development and training opportunities

**Employment Terms:**

This is a full-time position. You will be expected to adhere to company policies and maintain the highest standards of professionalism.

**Acceptance:**

To accept this offer, please sign and return a copy of this letter by replying to this email by 26 February 2025. If you have any questions or need further clarification, feel free to contact me.

We look forward to welcoming you to our team.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]  
DESCON HR Assistant

**DESCON Offer Letter**

**Date:** February 17, 2025

**Candidate Name:** Azeem  
**Email:** azeem@example.com  

Dear Azeem,

We are pleased to offer you the position of **Project Engineer** at DESCON. In this role, you will be responsible for overseeing project planning, execution, and completion, ensuring that all project objectives are met within the specified timeframe and budget. Your expertise will contribute significantly to our ongoing projects and organizational success.

**Position Details:**

- **Job Title:** Project Engineer
- **Start Date:** March 20, 2025
- **Working Hours:** 9 AM to 5 PM
- **Salary:** PKR 450,000 per month
- **Location:** Lahore

**Benefits:**

- Health insurance coverage
- Paid vacations: 20 days per year
- Professional development and training opportunities

**Employment Terms:**

This is a full-time role with an initial probation period of 3 months to assess performance and suitability for the position.

**Acceptance:**

To accept this offer, please sign and return a copy of this letter by replying to this email. If you have any questions or need further clarification, feel free to contact me.

**Offer Expiry Date:** February 24, 2025

We look forward to welcoming you to our team and are excited about the contributions you will make to DESCON.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]  
DESCON HR Assistant

**DESCON Offer Letter**

We are pleased to offer you the position of Senior Business Developer - Software Development at DESCON. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities and deliver impactful results.

- **Start Date:** March 4, 2025
- **Salary:** 100,000 PKR per month
- **Working Hours:** 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM

**Benefits:**

- Professional development and training opportunities

**Employment Terms:**

This is a full-time role with a probation period of 3 months to assess performance and fit within the team.

**Acceptance:**

To accept this offer, please sign and return a copy of this letter by replying to this email by February 21, 2025. If you have any questions or need further clarification, feel free to contact me.
